en.mission4: Check the big animals at exit
en.opening1_1: Here, you will learn a bit about animal group.
en.opening1_2: Now, you will start as a sheep. It’s getting dark and you have to go home soon.
en.opening1_3: Find your way out to exit the forest!
en.scene1_0: Oh no, it seems that the wolves are everywhere!
en.scene1_1: You’ll need to go past them to get out. But it’s dangerous!
en.scene1_2: You’ll need to find more friends to form a big group to defend yourselves from the wolves!
en.scene1_3: Try to search for sheep voices to help you locate them. Beware of the roaming wolves!
en.scene2_0: Great! Now that you have a large group, the wolves will think twice before attacking.
en.scene2_1: Basically, the larger the group, the less likely it will be for any one individual to die.
en.scene2_2: But sometimes, there are predators who still attacks large group. At least you’ll still have more chance of survival in a big group!
en.scene2_3: Now let’s go and exit this forest!
en.scene3_0: Great! You have succesfully exited the forest, thanks to your large group.
en.scene3_1: Larger animal group could increase their survivability. Don’t forget about that!
en.opening2_0: Now that you’ve known about group’s impact in survivability, let’s move to another animal.
en.opening2_1: Now you’ll start as a wolf. Your pack is hungry, and you must collect foods!
en.opening2_2: Try to collect as many food as you can.
en.scene5_0: Oof! That animal is too big for you alone to handle.
en.scene5_1: But if you could hunt it, it will surely provide a lot of meat for your pack!
en.scene5_2: You’ll need more power to defeat it. Try to find more friends to hunt together!
en.scene6_0: Nice! Now, with this number, you can surely defeat big animals.
en.scene6_1: Go and hunt for more meat with your friends!
en.scene7_0: Awesome! You have succesfully collected enough food for your pack.
en.scene7_1: Thanks to the wolf’s pack, they can hunt animals far bigger than themselves.
en.scene7_2: Larger animal group can increase their chance to get more food. Don’t forget about that!
